await token.mint(daoAddress, ethers.parseEther("1000000"))
const daoAddress = "YOUR_DAO_ADDRESS_HERE"
const token = await ethers.getContractAt("DaoToken", "YOUR_TOKEN_ADDRESS_HERE")
const daoAddress = "YOUR_DAO_ADDRESS_HERE"
const token = await ethers.getContractAt("DaoToken", "YOUR_TOKEN_ADDRESS_HERE")
